Nov 2 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:: *3I GROUP PLC - 3I PORTFOLIO COMPANY ACTION ANNOUNCES NEW CEO *3I GROUP - 3I PORTFOLIO COMPANY ACTION ANNOUNCES APPOINTMENT OF HAJIR HAJJI TO SUCCEED SANDER VAN DER LAAN AS CEO
